column1: '''Breredon''' (Briar Hill) was a little village in [[Buckland]] near [[Haysend]] on rising ground behind the hythe
column3: on the north bank of the [[Withywindle]] in the narrow tongue between the south end of the [[High Hay]] and the [[Baranduin]] River.<ref>{{AB|Preface}}</ref>
